title: 装了1.10.2服务端打不开
txt_content:
22.07 10:50:50 [Multicraft] Server stopped
22.07 10:50:50 [Multicraft] Looks like a crash, check the server console. Return value: 1
22.07 10:50:50 [Multicraft] Server shut down
22.07 10:50:50 [Server] INFO http://www.oracle.com/technetwor ... nloads-2133151.html
22.07 10:50:50 [Server] INFO Paper requires Java 8, please upgrade to it.
22.07 10:50:50 [Multicraft] Loaded config for "Default"
22.07 10:50:49 [Multicraft] Starting server!
22.07 10:50:49 [Multicraft] Loading server properties

在自己电脑上可以打开，放到服务器里面就这样子无限循环，打不开了，怎么办啊

replies.author: Dirito
replies.txt_content: 这个服务端需要java8，而你的java版本不对（可能你的是java7）

replies.author: lonwang
replies.txt_content: java问题，或者是服务端问题

replies.author: q211316907
replies.txt_content:
22.07 10:50:50 [Server] INFO Paper requires Java 8, please upgrade to it.
从这句话中看出- -
你需要java8开服
